calls;;webmaster@jaxtr.com;650-327-9300;VOIP phone calls to mobile phones;Fri Nov 25 09:02:45 UTC 2011;

Jaxtr first launched in March 2007 with a widget that enables users to receive calls from their friends through a VOIP connection and keep their personal phone numbers private.
jaxtr has introduced a number of additional services in the attempt to monetize the company’s 10 million users:

column1: -Jaxtr helps users bypass expensive international phone charges by giving them free local numbers in the countries that they’re calling to and charges a nominal fee for connection and the ability to call from a mobile phone. As a marketing ploy
column2: the company permits free calls to other members.
a social network in which people call one another to discuss similar interests
column3: and free global SMS to attract activity on its website and generate advertising revenue.

column1: The company maintains an advantage over competitors such as Skype by allowing customers to use any phone - mobile or landline - without the need to download software or maintain Internet access
column2:
and calling cards by eliminating the need to dial additional numbers and PIN codes.

;$21.5M
